#Scientific name is only one factor level so gam returns an error - 
`
```{r}
load("data_subsets.RData")
```

```{r}
library(mgcv)
```


##MODEL G

#Coccolithus_modG

```{r}
Coccolithus_modG <- gam(cells_per_litre ~ s(p_an, bs = "tp") + s(si_star, bs = "tp") + s(ni_star, bs = "tp") + s(s_an, bs = "tp") + s(t_an, bs = "tp") + s(scientific_name, bs = "re") + te(longitude, latitude, bs = c("cc","tp")) , data = data.Coccolithus)
summary(Coccolithus_modG)
```

##MODEL GS - environmental variables + group smoother scientific_name

#Coccolithus_modGS_p

```{r}
Coccolithus_modGS_p <- gam(cells_per_litre ~ s(p_an, bs = "tp") + s(si_star, bs = "tp") + s(ni_star, bs = "tp") + s(s_an, bs = "tp") + s(t_an, bs = "tp") + s(p_an, scientific_name, bs = "fs") + te(longitude, latitude, bs = c("cc", "tp")) + s(scientific_name, bs = "re"), data = data.Coccolithus, method = "REML")
summary(Coccolithus_modGS_p)
```

#Coccolithus_modGS_sistar

```{r}
Coccolithus_modGS_sistar <- gam(cells_per_litre ~ s(p_an, bs = "tp") + s(si_star, bs = "tp") + s(ni_star, bs = "tp") + s(s_an, bs = "tp") + s(t_an, bs = "tp") + s(si_star, scientific_name, bs = "fs") + te(longitude, latitude, bs = c("cc", "tp")) + s(scientific_name, bs = "re"), data = data.Coccolithus, method = "REML")
summary(Coccolithus_modGS_sistar)
```
